name: Birb Café Demo
description:
Birb Café is a coffee-making visual novel about a cute bird helping adventurers on their quests. Your choices matter!

Join Chelly as she picks up an apron and opens up her very own café: The Feathered Cup!
Her customers are adventurers from all over the world, and they need the perfect stat-boosting coffee to succeed on their quest: a strength boost, poison resist, or perhaps just something to soothe their nerves?

Whatever it is that they need, Chelly will do her absolute best to help them!

Demo features:
  • 8 days of coffee making
  • 5 unique customers, each with their own story
  • upgrade levels for your coffee beans, sweeteners, and recipes
  •  5 different coffee recipes, based on real recipes, and each with their own stats
  •  3 brewing methods, each with their own effects on drink stats
  •  branching paths and dialogue based on the coffee you serve, your customer's success depends on it... no pressure!
  •  a cute bird!

Please note: the HTML5 version is known to have audio issue when played via Chrome.

It is strongly recommended to use Firefox when playing this game OR to download the offline version.
